attributes.action: Secure Children & Youths Safety at Cinemas-Monitor all Areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Innocent children should be policed for one"s own safety at Cinemas and the general areas outside should have cameras and security staff monitoring.
Creepy, sexual deviants prowl in the darkened cinemas and the smelly toilets, "Smelly to deter the normal person for the natural purpose that a human being must do"
Sadly these male & in some cases female perverts are not detered,looking for youths in Cinemas.
Stop them now, if you care for under 16"s sign now!
